data.name: Scrapvival
data.detailed_description: Scrapvival is a survival game where you as a solo player or with help of your friends (up to 4 players in one lobby) are on the abandoned scrapyard where you have to start the 4 generators from which you can gather required parts to build the scrap helicopter and escape the evil robots that are trying to kill you from the moment you step inside their territory. Will you win, chicken out or lose? That's up to you!
data.about_the_game: Scrapvival is a survival game where you as a solo player or with help of your friends (up to 4 players in one lobby) are on the abandoned scrapyard where you have to start the 4 generators from which you can gather required parts to build the scrap helicopter and escape the evil robots that are trying to kill you from the moment you step inside their territory. Will you win, chicken out or lose? That's up to you!
data.short_description: Fight off robot hordes with help of your friends or alone as soon as possible build the helicopter and escape that damned and creepy junkyard!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3rd gen
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650Ti 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Try not to play on Intel HD Graphics, it might lag
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4440
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB/ AMD RX 5700 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3rd gen
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650Ti 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4440
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB/ AMD RX 5700 8GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16 (32-bit) or higher
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB Dedicated Memory
